Package ca.corefacility.bioinformatics.irida.ria.web.errors

Class ExceptionHandlerController

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.corefacility.bioinformatics.irida.ria.web.errors.ExceptionHandlerController
  • @ControllerAdvice(basePackages="ca.corefacility.bioinformatics.irida.ria.web")
public class ExceptionHandlerController
extends Object
    An controller that handles all exceptions that might be thrown when a user is navigating around in the web interface.

    • Method Detail

      • handleResourceNotFoundException

        @ExceptionHandler(EntityNotFoundException.class)
@ResponseStatus(NOT_FOUND)
public org.springframework.web.servlet.ModelAndView handleResourceNotFoundException​(EntityNotFoundException ex)
        Handle an EntityNotFoundException and return an http 404
        Parameters:
        ex - The EntityNotFoundException caught
        Returns:
        the name of the not_found view

      • handleAccessDeniedException

        @ExceptionHandler(org.springframework.security.access.AccessDeniedException.class)
@ResponseStatus(FORBIDDEN)
public org.springframework.web.servlet.ModelAndView handleAccessDeniedException​(org.springframework.security.access.AccessDeniedException ex)
        Handle an AccessDeniedException and return an Http 403
        Parameters:
        ex - The caught AccessDeniedException
        Returns:
        name of the access denied view

      • handleOAuthProblemException

        @ExceptionHandler(org.apache.oltu.oauth2.common.exception.OAuthProblemException.class)
@ResponseStatus(INTERNAL_SERVER_ERROR)
public org.springframework.web.servlet.ModelAndView handleOAuthProblemException​(org.apache.oltu.oauth2.common.exception.OAuthProblemException ex)
        Catch an OAuthProblemException and return an http 500 error
        Parameters:
        ex - the caught OAuthProblemException
        Returns:
        A ModelAndView containing the name of the oauth error view

      • handleOtherExceptions

        @ExceptionHandler(java.lang.Exception.class)
@ResponseStatus(INTERNAL_SERVER_ERROR)
public org.springframework.web.servlet.ModelAndView handleOtherExceptions​(Exception ex)
        Catch all other exception types and display a generic error page and 500 error
        Parameters:
        ex - The caught exception
        Returns:
        Name of the generic error page

      • handleIOException

        @ExceptionHandler(java.io.IOException.class)
@ResponseStatus(INTERNAL_SERVER_ERROR)
public org.springframework.ui.ModelMap handleIOException​(IOException e,
                                                         Locale locale)
        Catch and handle IOExceptions. Render an error that's just a general storage exception.
        Parameters:
        e - the exception that was originally thrown.
        locale - the locale of the request.
        Returns:
        an error message for general storage exceptions.

      • handleStorageException

        @ExceptionHandler(StorageException.class)
@ResponseStatus(INTERNAL_SERVER_ERROR)
public org.springframework.ui.ModelMap handleStorageException​(StorageException e,
                                                              Locale locale)
        Catch and handle all StorageExceptions. Try your best to figure out the root cause of the exception.
        Parameters:
        e - the exception that was originally thrown.
        locale - the locale of the request.
        Returns:
        an error message (hopefully) more specific than a general storage exception.
